results.title: Do the Right Thing
results.creator_credit: 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, Universal Pictures, Wynn Thomas, Spike Lee and Ruth E. Carter
results.brief_description: Do the Right Thing is a 1989 American comedy-drama film produced, written, and directed by Spike Lee. The story explores a Brooklyn neighbourhood’s simmering racial tension, which culminates in violence and a death on a hot summer day.

constellations_other.name: Into a World of Colour
constellations_other.description: Filmmakers have been using colour as a method of storytelling since the first moving pictures. Colour can be used to signify emotion, intensify drama or to create a strong visual aesthetic.

results.creator_credit_for_label: 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, Universal Pictures, Wynn Thomas, Spike Lee and Ruth E. Carter
results.description: Salvatore “Sal” Fragione is the Italian owner of a pizzeria in Brooklyn. A neighborhood local, Buggin’ Out, becomes upset when he sees that the pizzeria’s Wall of Fame exhibits only Italian actors. Buggin’ Out believes a pizzeria in a black neighborhood should showcase black actors, but Sal disagrees. The wall becomes a symbol of racism and hate to Buggin’ Out and to other people in the neighborhood, and tensions rise.
description_for_label: Salvatore “Sal” Fragione is the Italian owner of a pizzeria in Brooklyn. A neighborhood local, Buggin’ Out, becomes upset when he sees that the pizzeria’s Wall of Fame exhibits only Italian actors. Buggin’ Out believes a pizzeria in a black neighborhood should showcase black actors, but Sal disagrees. The wall becomes a symbol of racism and hate to Buggin’ Out and to other people in the neighborhood, and tensions rise.

results.title: Dizzy Dishes
results.brief_description: The Fleischer’s Talkartoon short that debuted the now infamous Betty Boop.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

results.description: The Fleischer’s Talkartoon short that debuted the now infamous Betty Boop.
description_for_label: The Fleischer’s Talkartoon short that debuted the now infamous Betty Boop.

results.title: Division 4
results.brief_description: A police drama based on the fictional Melbourne suburb of Yarra Central.
results.description: A police drama based on the fictional Melbourne suburb of Yarra Central.

results.title: Disturbia
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Cold Spring Pictures, DreamWorks Pictures, The Montecito Picture Company, Tom Pollock, E. Bennett Walsh, Joe Medjuck, D. J. Caruso, Marie-Sylvie Deveau, Tom Southwell, Christopher Landon, Carl Ellsworth, Jackie Marcus Schaffer and Kwame Parker
results.brief_description: Disturbia is a teen update of Alfred Hitchcock’s classic Rear Window starring Shia LeBouf.

constellations_other.name: Suburbia and surveillance
constellations_other.description: Tru-Vue and View-Masters allow users to look through view finders and discover new worlds and perspectives, something also explored through many films and TV shows, where watching often reveals secrets, truth and even illusions.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Paramount, Cold Spring Pictures, DreamWorks Pictures, The Montecito Picture Company, Tom Pollock, E. Bennett Walsh, Joe Medjuck, D. J. Caruso, Marie-Sylvie Deveau, Tom Southwell, Christopher Landon, Carl Ellsworth, Jackie Marcus Schaffer and Kwame Parker
results.description: Kale is a 17-year-old placed under house arrest after punching his teacher. He is confined to his house, and decides to use his free time spying on his neighbors. Things start to get weird when guests enter the Turner’s house and don’t come back out. Kale and his friends, Ronnie and Ashley, start to grow more and more interested in what is actually happening within the house of Robert Turner.
description_for_label: Kale is a 17-year-old placed under house arrest after punching his teacher. He is confined to his house, and decides to use his free time spying on his neighbors. Things start to get weird when guests enter the Turner’s house and don’t come back out. Kale and his friends, Ronnie and Ashley, start to grow more and more interested in what is actually happening within the house of Robert Turner.

results.title: Disclosure
results.creator_credit: Fork Films, JustFilms / Ford Foundation, California Humanites, Independent Film Producers (IFP), Sofia Midon, Amy Scholder, Avram Finklestein, Bow + Arrow Entertainment, Field of Vision, Disclosure Film and Sam Feder
results.brief_description: An investigation of how Hollywood’s fabled stories have deeply influenced how Americans feel about transgender people, and how transgender people have been taught to feel about themselves.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Fork Films, JustFilms / Ford Foundation, California Humanites, Independent Film Producers (IFP), Sofia Midon, Amy Scholder, Avram Finklestein, Bow + Arrow Entertainment, Field of Vision, Disclosure Film and Sam Feder
results.description: An investigation of how Hollywood’s fabled stories have deeply influenced how Americans feel about transgender people, and how transgender people have been taught to feel about themselves.

results.title: Disaster Playground
results.brief_description: Disaster Playground investigates future outer space catastrophes and the procedures to manage and assess the risks. The film follows the scientists planning the monitoring and deflection of hazardous Near Earth Objects.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

results.description: Disaster Playground investigates future outer space catastrophes and the procedures to manage and assess the risks. The film follows the scientists planning the monitoring and deflection of hazardous Near Earth Objects and the real-life procedures in place in the event of an asteroid collision with the earth. Follow the chain of command that runs from the SETI Institute and NASA to the White House and United Nations and meet the people who are responsible from protecting us from a potentially devastating asteroid impact.
description_for_label: Disaster Playground investigates future outer space catastrophes and the procedures to manage and assess the risks. The film follows the scientists planning the monitoring and deflection of hazardous Near Earth Objects and the real-life procedures in place in the event of an asteroid collision with the earth. Follow the chain of command that runs from the SETI Institute and NASA to the White House and United Nations and meet the people who are responsible from protecting us from a potentially devastating asteroid impact.

results.title: Dirty John
results.creator_credit: Atlas Entertainment, LA Times Studios and UCP
results.brief_description: Anthology series in which each season is based on a true crime story featuring an epic tale of love gone wrong.

constellations_other.name: Eric Bana
constellations_other.description: There must be something that draws Australian creatives like Eric Bana to darker material as they shoot to stardom overseas. Australia's penal colony past perhaps?

results.title: Dinosaurs
results.brief_description: Dinosaurs follows the life of a family of dinosaurs, living in a modern world. They have TV’s, fridges, microwaves, and every modern convenience.

constellations_other.name: Oscar-winning transformations and prosthetics
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores how craft help actors undergo award-winning transformations into iconic characters.

results.description: The World Without a Mask is a 1934 German science fiction film directed by and starring Harry Piel. It also features Olga Tschechowa and Rudolf Klein-Rogge.

results.title: Die Spezialisten – Im Namen der Opfer

constellations_other.name: Women and crime
